column1: Two trains leave a station 396 miles apart at the same time and travel towards each other. One train travels 95 miles per hour while the other travels at 85 miles per hour. How long will it take for the two trains to meet?
There are 10 marbles 5 of them are taken and there are 4 colours if 1 marble is black and there are 3 red, 3 white and 3 blue what is the likely chance I pick a black marble?
